info.description: Medius Pay public API documentation for European customers. Authentication: OAuth2 with Medius as identity server.
info.title: Medius Pay

post.summary: The POST method allows the client to send payment batches that will be imported into Medius Pay to be approved and paid. When import fails, incorrect payment batch is saved in Import error inbox within Medius Pay.
post.description: This is the POST method for the EU region.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Payment batch with list of payment items.

201.description: Payment batch saved in Medius Pay. IsSuccessful flag indicates the status of import.

400.description: When server was unable to parse the request, 400 status code with generic parsing error is returned.

payorId.description: Same as one of the company identifiers from Medius AP Automation. In order to import payment batch, matching identifier must be found

externalBatchId.description: External Payment Batch identifier. If provided then it has to be unique across all successfully imported batches.

items.description: Adding items to the import batch is mandatory. The limit is 5000 items per batch.

invoiceNumber.description: Payee-assigned invoice number. Must not appear twice for the same payee within a payments batch file.

voucherNumber.description: Voucher number from ERP, used to validate inside a single batch and between batches for possible duplicate payments

invoiceCompanyId.description: Company the invoice has been posted to in AP automation. Same as Company Id in Medius AP Automation. In order to import payment batch, matching identifier must be found

payeeId.description: Payee identifier - should be same as SupplierId in Medius AP Automation. Should be unique to each payee. Restricted characters: /  ? # |

remitToID.description: Identifier for a different remittance number or name for a payee (payees with multiple locations or bank accounts). Restricted characters: /  ? # |

payeeName.description: Payee name - should be same as supplier name in Medius AP Automation. Up to 255 characters allowed for domestic payments

payeeStreetLine1.description: Street address of the payee. __Note:__ required for international payments.

payeeStreetLine2.description: Second line of street address of the payee.

payeeCity.description: City of the payee. __Note:__ required for international payments.

payeeZipOrPostalCode.description: Zip or Postal Code of the payee. __Note:__ required for international payments.

payeeStateCode.description: State of the payee. ISO Alfa 2 code. __Note:__ required for international payments.

payeeCountryCode.description: Country of the payee. ISO Alpha2 code

paymentAmount.description: The amount to be paid for the invoice, may vary from invoice amount in case of partial payments or short payments. Max 12 digital places, including up to 2 decimal places. Maximum amount per item __2.000.000__, minimum amount per item __0.1__

paymentCurrencyCode.description: Currency in which vendor will be paid. ISO Alfa 3 code.

invoiceDueDate.description: Invoice Due Date in format yyyy-MM-dd.

invoiceAmount.description: Original invoice amount, may vary from paymentAmount in case of partial payments or short payment. Max 12 digital places including up to 2 decimal places

invoiceCurrencyCode.description: Currency of invoice. Required if invoiceAmount send. ISO Alfa 3 code.

comment.description: Comment for invoice from payor accounting system for information purposes during batch authorization process.

payorBankAccountIdentifier.description: Internal bank identifier, defined during funding bank account setup in Medius Pay. Needs to be an unique identifier for all payment items in the batch.

payeeBankCountryCode.description: Payees banks country. ISO Alpha2 code.

payeeAccountNumber.description: IBAN or basic account number. No spaces or dashes permitted. If IBAN is provided, payeeBankSwiftCode is required. If basic account number is provided, payeeBankSwiftCode or payeeRoutingNumber is required. PayeeAccountNumber is optional if payeeBankgiroNumber is provided.

payeeBankgiroNumber.description: When payeeBankgiroNumber is provided, payeeAccountNumber, payeeRoutingNumber and payeeBankSwiftCode are optional. If both payeeBankgiroNumber and combination of payeeAccountNumber, payeeRoutingNumber and payeeBankSwiftCode are provided, the combination of (payeeAccountNumber and payeeBankSwiftCode) or (payeeAccountNumber and payeeRoutingNumber) are used for payment execution.

payeeRoutingNumber.description: Required field when basic account number provided in payeeAccountNumber field. Optional if IBAN provided. This could be known as RoutingNumber, BranchCode, ABA number, transit number, MICR, IFSC, etc. Required for international payments in some countries.

payeeBankSwiftCode.description: A unique identification code assigned to a specific bank to proceed money transfer between banks internationally.

payeeContactPhone.description: Payees phone number. Do not include + or ().

payeeContactEmail.description: Used to send confirmation email to payee.

paymentReference.description: A payment reference number from the customers accounting system. If not provided, invoiceNumber will be used as payment reference.

payeeDateOfBirth.description: Date of birth in yyyy-MM-dd format

payeePassportNumber.description: The Passport number of the payee.

isSuccessful.description: true when payment batch was successfully imported otherwise false.

externalDocs.description: Find out more information in the success portal
